1-4-1.thereMightBe:
There might be some clues inside.
Do you want to open it and take a look?
1-4-1.name: You

1-4-4.theDiary:
The diary records the story of you and
someone important planting a tree together
1-4-4.planting:
Planting a tree is like
starting something new.
When you planted this tree,
you wrote down your goal
in the diary.
